mapper.select: SELECT i.* , c.parent_id AS catalog_parent_id, c.sn AS catalog_sn, c.title AS catalog_title, c.description AS catalog_description, c.icon AS catalog_icon, c.level AS catalog_level, c.created_at AS catalog_created_at, c.updated_at AS catalog_updated_at FROM itsnow_msc.public_service_items i join itsnow_msc.public_service_catalogs c ON i.catalog_id = c.id WHERE i.sn = #{sn}
